body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support team. My name is Adam Flores and I'm from XYZ Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Julie. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the checkout process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, Julie. Could you provide me with your reservation number and the date of your check-in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My reservation number is one zero zero two and I checked in on the seventh of September.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Julie. Let me look into your reservation details.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It seems like there was a misunderstanding in our system. I will make sure to resolve it for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Julie. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. Thank you for your time.
